name: "The Simpsons" Season 2 Volume 1 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the opening credits, what is the amount rung up when Maggie is run over the scanner?
questions.explanation:
847.63

	If you paused the DVD and step frame by frame you are able to read the amount.

questions.text: Who is the Governor of the state the Simpsons live in?
questions.explanation:
Mary Bailey.

	In the episode, "Two Cars In Every Garage And Three Eyes On Every Fish", Mr Burns takes on Mary Bailey and eventually loses to her in the election for Governor.

questions.text: What is the state motto of the state the Simpsons live in?
options: The "We've Never Mentioned a State" State
questions.explanation:
Not Just Another State.

	In the episode, "Two Cars In Every Garage And Three Eyes On Every Fish", the state flag is shown with those words written on it.

questions.text: In the episode "Dead Putting Society", what is the name that Homer gives to Bart's putter?
questions.explanation:
Charlene.

	After Bart suggest Mr Putter, Homer tells him his putter's name will be Charlene.

questions.text: When Homer gets a promotion after growing hair, where does his assistant Karl take him to buy a suit?
questions.explanation:
Royal Majesty.

	Karl was voiced by Harvey Fierstein. The motto of Royal Majesty was "Clothing for the obese or gangly gentleman."

questions.text: What is on the top on Ned Flander's stationery?
questions.explanation:
From the "Noggin" of Ned.

	Another set of personalized stationery in the series was Marge's which read "From the Mind of Marge."

questions.text: In the miniature golf tournament, what was the last name of the person that Bart beat to get into the finals against Todd Flanders?
questions.explanation:
Wiggum.

	When they are standing in front of the brackets for the tournament, you can see Wiggum's name under Bart's on the board.

questions.text: In the episode "Simpson and Delilah", how old does Mr. Burns say he is?
questions.explanation:
81.

	He states that he is 81 years old.  I don't know how he aged a whole lot during the series while the rest of them are still the same age.

questions.text: In the episode "Dancing Homer", Bleeding Gum Murphy starts the National Anthem at 7:30.  What time is it when he finishes it?
questions.explanation:
7:56.

	His version of the National Anthem took 26 minutes to perform and only Lisa is left standing at attention when he finishes.

questions.text: What language do Kang and Kodos speak?
questions.explanation:
Rigellian.

	They speak Rigellian which sounds exactly like English.  Homer says " you speak English" and they respond by saying "We speak Rigellian, it just so happens it sounds exactly like English."
